short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clippy is an image viewer that loads all the images in active tab and allows you to download all images with a click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clippy is an image viewer, it loads all the images in currently active chrome tab and shows them inside the extension. You can also download theses images with a click of a button inside Clippy.
